#Text=Wikinews interviews Eric Saussine , director of the James Bond fan film Shamelady
#Text=Wednesday , July 16 , 2008
#Text=The James Bond film series is one of the most popular and successful , having grossed over US$ 4 billion worldwide .
#Text=The suave , sophisticated secret agent has secured his place in popular culture as the definitive action hero that has appeared in twenty-three films between 1954 and 2006 .
#Text=Daniel Craig was announced as the seventh actor to portray 007 in late 2005 , making his debut in the 2006 smash hit Casino Royale .

#Text=While fans await Craig 's second outing in Quantum of Solace , due later this year , they have been able to watch Shamelady , a fan film made by the French film production company Constellation Studios .
#Text=Shamelady is a tribute to Ian Fleming , the author of the James Bond novels on which many of the films are based , and EON Productions , the makers of the official 007 films .
#Text=The film was first released in 2007 and runs just under an hour long .
#Text=It can be downloaded from Constellation 's website or viewed on YouTube .
#Text=Legally , the filmmakers cannot profit from Shamelady , but they did n't make it for the money , rather the thrill of creating an original Bond film .
#Text=The plot is fairly simple , and reminiscent of Casino Royale .
#Text=Bond is sent to a casino to nab a vicious crime lord , but gets betrayed by a fellow agent in the process .
#Text=Viewer reaction to the film was positive for the most part , and Constellation Studios has now planned a sequel to Shamelady , which director Eric Saussine speaks of in the interview below .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Although having made several other movies , Constellation Studios is best known for the acclaimed James Bond fan film Shamelady .
#Text=Tell us about it .
#Text=Shamelady attempts to be a true James Bond adventure , except in length .
#Text=Our 007 lasts 54 minutes .
#Text=The story takes place in Iraq , England and France .
#Text=James Bond is sent to the south of France to buy information about a secret organization that terrorizes Great Britain .
#Text=During the operation , a couple of killers put a deadly stop to the exchange .
#Text=Bond escapes , whereas Mangin - who provided the information - is killed .
#Text=For MI6 , it 's vivid evidence that S.P.E.C.T.R.E. - the criminal organization to which James Bond was formerly opposed - is back .
#Text=From this point , Bond goes to the casino of Luc-sur-Mer , Normandy , in search of Descarpes who is suspected of being the number 2 of the organization .
#Text=Bond challenges Descarpes at the roulette table and seduces Anna Raykova , a mysterious Russian woman working for his adversary .
#Text=Our favorite spy escapes several murder attempts but , in a nod to Casino Royale , he soon realizes that he is being betrayed .
#Text=Anyway , the bad guy dies in the end !
#Text=Some things are eternal .
#Text=Shamelady is a tribute to the men at the origin of the myth : original author Ian Fleming and James Bond producers Harry Saltzman and Albert Broccoli .
